name: ICPI Train2Teach-Online
tag_list: teacher, trainer, tutor, international, e-teacher-trainer, tutoring, job-oriented, fast-track, training, teaching, mentoring, education, career, e-trainer, e--teacher, professional, e-mentoring, e-seminars, workshops, e-learning, college, school, educator
description: Train e-teachers for the age of internet
overview: ICPI –Train2Teach-Online a web based training institution where teachers and trainers are e-trained, mentored, tested and certified to teach online in real time under our proprietary training programme “Certified International E-Teacher” or CIET. Aim is to provide teachers & trainers with single-point, end-to-end career advancement solutions without the constraints of time and place.
